name: electro-ball
flavor_text: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move’s power.
effect_text_extend:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's Speed compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150.

User's Speed                     | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's Speed      |    60
Up to 3× the target's Speed      |    80
Up to 4× the target's Speed      |   120
More than 4× the target's Speed  |   150
effect_text_simple: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.
